mapper.insert: INSERT INTO driver_info( wx_open_id, nickname, avatar_url, phone, name, gender, birthday, idcard_no, idcard_address, idcard_expire, idcard_front_url, idcard_back_url, idcard_hand_url, driver_license_class, driver_license_no, driver_license_expire, driver_license_issue_date, driver_license_front_url, driver_license_back_url, driver_license_hand_url, contact_name, contact_phone, contact_relationship, face_model_id, job_no, order_count, score, auth_status, status ) VALUES ( #{wxOpenId}, #{nickname}, #{avatarUrl}, #{phone}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{idcardNo}, #{idcardAddress}, #{idcardExpire}, #{idcardFrontUrl}, #{idcardBackUrl}, #{idcardHandUrl}, #{driverLicenseClazz}, #{driverLicenseNo}, #{driverLicenseExpire}, #{driverLicenseIssueDate}, #{driverLicenseFrontUrl}, #{driverLicenseBackUrl}, #{driverLicenseHandUrl}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactRelationship}, #{faceModelId}, #{jobNo}, #{orderCount}, #{score}, #{authStatus}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE driver_info SET nickname = #{nickname}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl}, phone = #{phone}, gender = #{gender}, score = #{score}, status = #{status}, auth_status = #{authStatus} WHERE name = #{name}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM driver_login_log WHERE driver_id = ( SELECT id FROM driver_info WHERE name = #{name} LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
